00031   using namespace std;
00037   class DiscreteRandomGenerator : public ReferenceCount {
00038 
00039   public:
00043     DiscreteRandomGenerator();
00044 
00045     virtual ~DiscreteRandomGenerator() { delete [] m_cmf; };
00046 
00047     void set_seed(unsigned int s) {
00048       m_seed = s;
00049       m_rng.seed((uint32_t)m_seed);
00050       m_u01 = boost::uniform_01<boost::mt19937>(m_rng);
00051     }
00052 
00053     void set_max(uint64_t max) {
00054       m_max_val = max;
00055       delete [] m_cmf;
00056       m_cmf = 0;
00057     }
00058 
00063     virtual uint64_t get_sample();
00064 
00065   protected:
00066 
00070     virtual void generate_cmf();
00071 
00078     virtual double pmf(uint64_t val) { return 1.0 / (double)m_max_val; }
00079 
00080     boost::mt19937 m_rng;
00081     boost::uniform_01<boost::mt19937> m_u01;
00082     unsigned int m_seed;
00083     uint64_t m_max_val;
00084     double *m_cmf;
00085   };
